h1: How Many Calories Are in a Glazed Donut?
assumptions: Standard yeast-raised glazed donut (~60 g), fried, with sugar glaze; similar to common brands like Dunkin' or Krispy Kreme.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and frying method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard glazed donut contains about 242 calories.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a glazed donut?
faqs.a: Approximately 242 calories for a standard size.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a glazed donut?
faqs.a: About 29 g of carbohydrates, including 13 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a glazed donut high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 13 g total fat, with 6 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in a glazed donut?
faqs.a: Brands vary; Dunkin' is ~230 kcal, Krispy Kreme ~190 kcal per donut.

faqs.q: Are there lower-calorie glazed donut options?
faqs.a: Baked or mini versions can reduce calories by 50-100 kcal.
